1370: Abelkijn moved to Cingel.B.2 after marriage.
Got married to Ymmekine at age 30 in 1370.
1371: Had a daughter with Ymmekine, Leanne, at age 31.
1374: Had a daughter with Ymmekine, bertrade, at age 34.
1375: Had a son with Ymmekine, Thitardo, at age 35.
1376: Lost daughter bertrade when bertrade was 3 years old.
Lost son Thitardo when Thitardo was 2 years old.
1377: Had a daughter with Ymmekine, Godeweris, at age 37.
1378: Had a daughter with Ymmekine, Verthwi, at age 38.
1380: Had a daughter with Ymmekine, Thedwi, at age 40.
1383: Had a son with Ymmekine, Jacobus, at age 43.
1384: Lost son Jacobus when Jacobus was 2 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
